languages.text: "Запрос отклонен. Фиксирую в данном препарате ряд психоактивных веществ, подавляющих умственные способности". {n}Паскаль бросает долгий взгляд на фонтан.{/n} "Мирянин, додумавшийся разместить фонтан с ядом в публичном месте, вероятно, находился под его воздействием".

"Request denied. I am registering a number of mind-altering substances in this preparation that act as cognitive suppressants." {n}Pasqal casts a long glance at the fountain.{/n} "The layman or woman who conceived the idea of installing a poisonous fountain in a public place must have been under the influence of the poison themselves."
languages.original_text: "Запрос отклонен. Фиксирую в данном препарате ряд психоактивных веществ, подавляющих умственные способности". {n}Паскаль бросает долгий взгляд на фонтан.{/n} "Мирянин, додумавшийся разместить фонтан с ядом в публичном месте, вероятно, находился под его воздействием".

I record a number of mind-altering substances in this preparation that act as cognitive suppressants." {n}Pasqal casts a long glance at the fountain.{/n} "The layman or woman who came up with the idea of installing a poisonous fountain in a public place must have been under the influence of the poison."

"Request declined. languages.text: “请求已拒绝。已在此制剂中检测到多种会改变思维的物质，上述物质会起到抑制认知的作用。”{n}帕斯卡久久地看着喷泉。{/n}“那些想出在公共场所安装剧毒喷泉的教外人士，肯定本身也受到了毒液的影响。”
languages.original_text: "Request denied. I am registering a number of mind-altering substances in this preparation that act as cognitive suppressants." {n}Pasqal casts a long glance at the fountain.{/n} "The layman or woman who conceived the idea of installing a poisonous fountain in a public place must have been under the influence of the poison themselves."

traits.locale_text: “请求已拒绝。已在此制剂中检测到多种会改变思维的物质，上述物质会起到抑制认知的作用。”{n}帕斯卡久久地看着喷泉。{/n}“那些想出在公共场所安装剧毒喷泉的教外人士，肯定本身也受到了毒液的影响。”

languages.text: 「要請は却下します。この飲料には、認識機能を抑制する精神作用物質が複数含まれていることを確認しました」{n}パスカルは噴水をじっと見つめた。{/n}「公の場に毒の噴水を設置しようなどと思いついた素人は、自らその毒の影響下にあったに違いありません」
languages.original_text: "Request denied. I am registering a number of mind-altering substances in this preparation that act as cognitive suppressants." {n}Pasqal casts a long glance at the fountain.{/n} "The layman or woman who conceived the idea of installing a poisonous fountain in a public place must have been under the influence of the poison themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「要請は却下します。この飲料には、認識機能を抑制する精神作用物質が複数含まれていることを確認しました」{n}パスカルは噴水をじっと見つめた。{/n}「公の場に毒の噴水を設置しようなどと思いついた素人は、自らその毒の影響下にあったに違いありません」

languages.text: «Solicitud denegada. Este brebaje contiene diversas sustancias enajenantes que inhiben las funciones cognitivas». {n}Pasqal observa detenidamente la fuente.{/n} «El seglar que concibió la idea de instalar un aspersor de veneno en una zona pública debía de estar sin duda bajo los efectos de ese mismo veneno».
languages.original_text: "Request denied. I am registering a number of mind-altering substances in this preparation that act as cognitive suppressants." {n}Pasqal casts a long glance at the fountain.{/n} "The layman or woman who conceived the idea of installing a poisonous fountain in a public place must have been under the influence of the poison themselves."

traits.locale_text: «Solicitud denegada. Este brebaje contiene diversas sustancias enajenantes que inhiben las funciones cognitivas». {n}Pasqal observa detenidamente la fuente.{/n} «El seglar que concibió la idea de instalar un aspersor de veneno en una zona pública debía de estar sin duda bajo los efectos de ese mismo veneno».

languages.text: "Talep reddedildi. Bu müstahzarda bilişsel baskılayıcı işlevi gören bir dizi zihin değiştirici madde tespit ediyorum." {n}Pasqal, çeşmeye uzunca bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Halka açık bir yere zehirli bir çeşme kurma fikrini tasarlayan avam da bizzat bu zehrin etkisinde olmalı."
languages.original_text: "Request denied. I am registering a number of mind-altering substances in this preparation that act as cognitive suppressants." {n}Pasqal casts a long glance at the fountain.{/n} "The layman or woman who conceived the idea of installing a poisonous fountain in a public place must have been under the influence of the poison themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Talep reddedildi. Bu müstahzarda bilişsel baskılayıcı işlevi gören bir dizi zihin değiştirici madde tespit ediyorum." {n}Pasqal, çeşmeye uzunca bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Halka açık bir yere zehirli bir çeşme kurma fikrini tasarlayan avam da bizzat bu zehrin etkisinde olmalı."

languages.text: « Demande refusée. Je détecte dans cette préparation un certain nombre de substances agissant comme des inhibiteurs cognitifs. {n}Pasqal lance un long regard à la fontaine.{/n} Le ou la profane ayant eu l'idée d'installer une fontaine de poison dans un lieu public devait être sous l'influence du même breuvage. »
languages.original_text: "Request denied. I am registering a number of mind-altering substances in this preparation that act as cognitive suppressants." {n}Pasqal casts a long glance at the fountain.{/n} "The layman or woman who conceived the idea of installing a poisonous fountain in a public place must have been under the influence of the poison themselves."

traits.locale_text: « Demande refusée. Je détecte dans cette préparation un certain nombre de substances agissant comme des inhibiteurs cognitifs. {n}Pasqal lance un long regard à la fontaine.{/n} Le ou la profane ayant eu l'idée d'installer une fontaine de poison dans un lieu public devait être sous l'influence du même breuvage. »

languages.text: "Anfrage abgewiesen. Ich registriere eine Reihe bewusstseinsverändernder Substanzen in diesem Präparat, die als kognitive Beruhigungsmittel dienen. {n}Pasqal wirft einen langen Blick auf den Brunnen.{/n} "Der Laie, der auf die Idee kam, einen giftigen Brunnen an einem öffentlichen Platz zu errichten, muss selbst unter dem Einfluss des Giftes gestanden haben."
languages.original_text: "Request denied. I am registering a number of mind-altering substances in this preparation that act as cognitive suppressants." {n}Pasqal casts a long glance at the fountain.{/n} "The layman or woman who conceived the idea of installing a poisonous fountain in a public place must have been under the influence of the poison themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Anfrage abgewiesen. Ich registriere eine Reihe bewusstseinsverändernder Substanzen in diesem Präparat, die als kognitive Beruhigungsmittel dienen. {n}Pasqal wirft einen langen Blick auf den Brunnen.{/n} "Der Laie, der auf die Idee kam, einen giftigen Brunnen an einem öffentlichen Platz zu errichten, muss selbst unter dem Einfluss des Giftes gestanden haben."
